Name: Slide Stories: Neko's Journey
About the game: It is a relaxing and charming slide puzzle with graphic novel elements in which a cat, Neko, travels with its owner, Nina, to lovely places. Following the flow: Complete one puzzle and unlock the next one; Enjoy all the difficulties, available from the beginning; Relax with a soft lo-fi soundtrack; 6 stunning and original hand-drawn animations to assemble; 5 different levels of difficulty; 3 tools to help you out solving the puzzles;
